full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BLA MA TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO LA STONG MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA KUN BZANG 'KHRI SHING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA KUN GYI MKHYEN BRTZE NUS GSUM GCIG TU BSDUS PA'I NGO BO KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO LA @020B MDO CHOG GI LUGS BZHIN STONG MCHOD JI LTAR 'BUL TSUL GYI CHO GA 'DI NI SOG YUL DU 'DUG SKABS, NGED KYI GAM DU 'KHOR BA'I DPON PO MDZOD PA NGAG DBANG NOR BU, ,MDZOD PA PA BSOD NAMS DBANG RGYAL, NYE GNAS DGE SLONG DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL DANG, DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN RIN CHEN, DGE SLONG SKAL LDAN CHOS 'PHEL, DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG ,DGE SLONG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS, DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS STOBS LDAN, GSOL DPON DGE TSUL 'JAM DBYANGS MKHAS BTZUN SOGS RANG GI ZHABS GRAS PA RNAMS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG RNA BA GTZER BAS RKYEN BYAS, RANG GZHAN GYIS MCHOD 'BUL SOGS KYI SKABS SU'ANG NYE BAR 'KHO BAR BSAM NAS, CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I MCHOD RTEN MCHOD CHOG LA GZHI BYAS, GZHAN DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG LAS LEGS CHA BLANGS TE, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN GZUGS CHE SHOS SPRUL MING 'DZIN PA NGAG DBANG BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS RANG SHAG PHUN TSOGS 'DOD 'JOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NYE GNAS DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS SNYAN GRAGS SO, ,'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON BLA MA MCHOG GIS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,) @021B CES DGE LDAN BSTAN PA'I RTZA LAG DAM PA CHE SHOS MKHAN CHEN MCHOG GIS MDZAD PA'I ^RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO LA STONG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL GYI CHO GA PAR DU BSGRUBS PAS, PAR BYANG SMON TSIG TU MI NYAG PAKSHI'AM MKHAN PO BLA MAR 'BOD PAS DANG CHEN POS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BZHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I NYI MA,
